ClassDesc: Constants for customizing a http:##developer#android#com@B_android#app#RemoteInput_E@ instance. These constants define extras that can be added to a http:##developer#android#com@B_android#app#RemoteInput_E@ to change the input options that will be presented. For example, to create a RemoteInput that will allow free form input (e.g. voice input on Wear), but not show the Draw Emoji option:
